member.name: M:CODE.Framework.Services.Server.WebApi.ServiceHostController`1.BeforeInvokeMethod(HttpControllerContext,System.String,System.String,MethodInfo,System.Object)
member.summary: Fires before the controller method is invoked. (Designed to be overridden in subclasses)
member.param: Name of the method to invoke
HTTP verb used to call the method (Get, Put,...)
Detailed information about the method that is about to be invoked
Input contract object. ("The parameter object for the method call")
